original: @205a * // gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa //
analyzed: @205a * // gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa //
translated: Praise to the White Parasol Uṣṇīṣa

original: srid gsum ston pa lha yi lha //
analyzed: srid gsum ston pa lha yi lha //
translated: Teacher of the three existences, god of gods,

original: mtshungs med bde gshegs sh'a kya seng ge yi //
analyzed: mtshungs med bde gshegs sh'a kya seng ge yi //
translated: Incomparable Sugata Śākya Lion,

original: mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil ba'i spyi gtsug nas //
analyzed: mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil ba'i spyi gtsug nas //
translated: From the top of your head, with its deep blue clockwise curl,

original: ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso //
analyzed: ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso //
translated: The wondrous, marvelous goddess, chief of the wrathful kings,

original: khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de //
analyzed: khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de //
translated: In the three realms there is no protector like you,

original: thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha //
translated: Lord of compassion, supreme auspicious deity,

original: sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra //
analyzed: sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra //
translated: Your body color like the rising sun on a snow mountain peak,

original: zhal mang stong la spyan mang bye ba brgya //
analyzed: zhal mang stong la spyan mang bye ba brgya //
translated: With a thousand faces, a billion eyes,

original: srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam thag pa //
analyzed: srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam thag pa //
translated: Sentient beings in the prison of existence are distressed,

original: dus gsum gzigs nas sems can grol mdzad de //
analyzed: dus gsum gzigs nas sems can grol mdzad de //
translated: Seeing them in the three times, you liberate sentient beings,

original: zhal stong phyag stong spyan stong rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: zhal stong phyag stong spyan stong rnams kyis ni //
translated: With your thousand faces, thousand arms, and thousand eyes,

original: kun la khyab mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: kun la khyab mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: You pervade all, I pay homage and praise you.

original: bdud dang bgegs rigs pas kyi rgol ba rnams //
analyzed: bdud dang bgegs rigs pas kyi rgol ba rnams //
translated: Demons, obstructors, and opponents,

original: spyan mang gzigs pas khro gnyar 'ga' ston pas //
analyzed: spyan mang gzigs pas khro gnyar 'ga' ston pas //
translated: With your many eyes you show a frown,

original: gnod pa'i rgyun rnams gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: gnod pa'i rgyun rnams gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: You who completely destroy the continuity of harm,

original: rgol ba tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rgol ba tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, O vanquisher of opponents.

original: ma rig nor bas bslus pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: ma rig nor bas bslus pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: Sentient beings deceived by the delusion of ignorance,

original: rang gi las nyid rnam par smin pa yi //
analyzed: rang gi las nyid rnam par smin pa yi //
translated: Due to the ripening of their own karma,

original: 'du ba rnam bzhi'i ri mas nad mi bzad pa //
analyzed: 'du ba rnam bzhi'i ri mas nad mi bzad pa //
translated: Are afflicted by the unbearable illness of the four gatherings.

original: zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod //🔽ji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la //
analyzed: zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod // ji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, O compassionate one who brings peace.🔽Just as you, with supreme compassion,

original: thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyer bzung nas //
analyzed: thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyer bzung nas //
translated: Took up the welfare of beings and liberated many sentient beings

original: srid gsum 'jigs pa che las bsgral gyur cing //
analyzed: srid gsum 'jigs pa che las bsgral gyur cing //
translated: From the great dangers of the three existences,

original: sdug bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar //
translated: And freed them from the illness of many sufferings,

original: bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te //
analyzed: bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te //
translated: May I too, like you, become a protector of beings,🔽And for sentient beings seized by the noose of the nāgas

original: sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang // nad kyi bskal pas nyen pa'i sems can la //
analyzed: sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang // nad kyi bskal pas nyen pa'i sems can la //
translated: And afflicted by the danger of the kalala illness,🔽May I become the refuge that removes suffering.

original: sdug bsngal sel ba'i skyabs su da gyur cig /'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la bstod pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: sdug bsngal sel ba'i skyabs su da gyur cig /'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la bstod pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of Noble Sitātapatrā is complete.
